name: Treasure Island (itch) (ZeusnZ)
description:
Treasure Island

Find the treasures of Treasure Island.  A game made in 3days for Mini Jam 50.

For this game I tried to use the Quixel Megascans Library (wich is free for UE4 users now) to create a tripple-A looking game in a very short amount of time.  The gameplay isn't very advanced but I'm happy with the overall game. :)

Controls:

WASD to move.

M to open the Treasure map.

Alt + F4 to exit the game.
